snippet.title: Super Amazing Wagon Adventure - Dream Build Play 2012 Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now for Xbox Live Indie Games and Windows PC!  http://www.sparsevector.com/wagon-adventure/

Super Amazing Wagon Adventure is a 2D action game that's different every time you play.  You control a party of three migrating west in a covered wagon.  The game consists of short 3-30 second long scenes that are pieced together in a random way to tell a crazy story.  Anything can happen!  Face bears, buffalo, wolves, bandits, eagles, vultures, scorpions, snakes, spiders, bats, coyotes, avalanches, aliens, unicorns and more!

Game by sparesvector: http://www.sparsevector.com
Follow me on twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/#!/sparsevector
For more information about the game visit: http://www.sparsevector.com/wagon-adventure
